trans-unit.source: Provides data for the layout event for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The layout event occurs when the size or position of the designer or its contained components change.
The ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs contains the graphics used to make layout changes and the designer theme to use for look and feel.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics and designer theme.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used the layout the designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> to use for look and feel.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> associated with the root workflow.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> is used to describe designer look and feel properties, such as colors, styles, and backgrounds.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> that contains theme information for the designer.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the designer.

If a designer has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associated with it, the designer will use the look and feel properties described by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> to paint itself.

If no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> is associated with the designer, the designer will use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> to repaint its look and feel properties.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that describes the designer look and feel.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to lay out the designer.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object provides methods for drawing objects on the display device.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to lay out the designer.
